name: Cozy Retreat
description: Basic hotel room with essential amenities, including a comfortable bed, private bathroom, TV, and Wi-Fi. Suitable for two guests.

name: Tranquil Haven
description: Standard room offering enhanced facilities such as upgraded bedding, improved toiletries, better entertainment options, and sometimes additional space. Perfect for a comfortable stay for two guests.

name: Luxury Suite
description: Luxurious rooms with spacious layouts, high-quality bedding, lavish bathrooms, advanced entertainment systems, and sometimes exclusive access to lounges. Ideal for up to four guests seeking a more indulgent experience.

name: Prestige Room
description: Deluxe accommodations with refined luxury, spacious layout, upscale bedding, lavish bathrooms, advanced entertainment, and potential access to exclusive dining and services. Great for up to four guests seeking exclusive comfort.

name: Executive Suite
description: Expansive suites with separate living, dining, and work areas, lavish bedrooms, opulent bathrooms, advanced entertainment, and potentially exclusive amenities. Suitable for up to six guests seeking luxurious indulgence.

name: Presidential Suite
description: Palatial suites offering extravagant facilities, sprawling living spaces, luxurious bedrooms and bathrooms, advanced entertainment, and potential exclusive services. Perfect for up to six discerning guests seeking elite experiences.
